frontmatter.title: PostGraphile Releases Version 4.1 - Better Webpackability!
frontmatter.thumbnailAlt: A developer working at a laptop, the GitHub contribution graph is projected behind him
frontmatter.summary: Building upon the huge performance gains found in Version 4, the release of Version 4.1 has a huge improvement to startup performance in serverless environments. This update also brings a large number of enhancements including much broader PostgreSQL function support, an enhanced GraphiQL interface, and a lot more helpers for writing plugins.

frontmatter.title: GraphQL Finland
frontmatter.thumbnailAlt: A cartoon developer leans against an oversized laptop showing the YouTube logo
frontmatter.summary: Benjie gave a talk on Database-Driven GraphQL Development at GraphQL Finland. Learn how a database-centric approach to GraphQL API development can give your engineers more time to focus on the important parts of your project.

frontmatter.title: PostGraphile Launches Version 4
frontmatter.thumbnailAlt: Graph showing Version 4 has 94% reduced latency
frontmatter.summary: Version 4 has launched! More performant, more extensible and more customisable than ever before. Easily extend PostGraphile's functionality with plugins developed and shared by the community.
